header_dataID_networkLabel.title: Network Label
header_dataID_networkLabel.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between 1 and 1600000 or greater than 2000000

header_date_year.title: YYYY
header_date_year.msg1: Error: Year must be a 4-digit number at least 1992.

header_date_month.title: MON
header_date_month.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between 1 and 12.

header_date_day.title: DD
header_date_day.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between 1 and 31, depending on Month.
header_date_day.msg2: Error: Value of month indicates this value must be at most 30.
header_date_day.msg3: Error: Value of month and year indicates this value must be at most 29.
header_date_day.msg4: Error: Value of month and year indicates this value must be at most 28.

header_date_measureNumber.title: Measure Number
header_date_measureNumber.msg1: Error: Must be an integer between 0 and 999.

header_crewInitials1.title: Person 1
header_crewInitials1.msg1: Error: Value cannot exceed three characters.

header_crewInitials2.title: Person 2
header_crewInitials2.msg1: Error: Value cannot exceed three characters.

header_crewInitials3.title: Person 3
header_crewInitials3.msg1: Error: Value cannot exceed three characters.

header_plotType.title: Plot Type
header_plotType.msg1: Error: Must be one of: LTC, LTS

header_nominalPlotSize.title: Nominal Plot Size (ha)
header_nominalPlotSize.msg1: Error: Must be a number between 0.03 and 0.1
header_nominalPlotSize.msg2: Warning: Ensure plot size should not be 0.04 ha.

header_measuredPlotSize.title: Measured Plot Size (ha)
header_measuredPlotSize.msg1: Error: Muyst be a number between 0.0075 and 0.1
header_measuredPlotSize.msg2: Warning: Ensure plot size should not be 0.04 ha.
